author: pellekrab
content:
Does anyone from Lighthouse or Lodestar know why engine_newPayloadV5 passes 0 IL's? Prysm in a Reth<>Prysm pair passes IL's so I am assuming its a CL issue.

Lighthouse logs:
```
 16 21:25:36.700 INFO  Successfully added inclusion list transactions to the cache  slot: Slot(47), tx_count: 113 
Sep 16 21:25:38.023 INFO  Prepared beacon proposer                      prepare_slot: 49, validator: 12, parent_root: 0xe60337866e8481a564f392b671a8a401f984fa35d17ea6f73760940e747c6c42 
Sep 16 21:25:38.855 INFO  New block received                            slot: 48, root: 0x0f4a3461463b3c4e9654cdd914276426ae187b312d38a2c1d1ae4cfb96f6d2ad 
Sep 16 21:25:38.867 INFO  Adding inclusion list transactions in the Payload Notifier  tx_count: 0, slot: Slot(48)
// I added this logging and it lines up with my Reth logs (this happens with Geth too)
Sep 16 21:25:38.887 INFO  Sending engine_newPayloadV5 with inclusion-list transactions  il_tx_count: 0 
```

Any ideas? Is this something I should spend time looking into, or is it intentional?
